list_definition.definition: a cloud of moisture in the air but very close to the ground, which makes it difficult to see any distance

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The hills are covered in thick mist.

list_ex_of_english: With that, any exact meaning in diplomatic recognition fades into the mists.
Powerful forces rise with the mists from our wooded hills and lakes.
The answer is shrouded in the mists of secrecy.
We have had, perhaps for the moment, enough of the stormy seas and the mists on the mountains.
I hope it is a happy augury that the sun has come through the mists.
I find it very difficult to look through the mists of all that and understand what will happen in the event.
What about the obliteration of so many villages, some with history stretching back into the mists of the past?
